scripts.build:autotest: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --build-arg PHP_VERSION=7.4 -t registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/tke-view/view:autotest --push autotest
scripts.build:php8.2: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --build-arg PHP_VERSION=8.2 -t registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/tke-view/view:php8.2 --push view/debian
scripts.build:php8.4: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --build-arg PHP_VERSION=8.4 -t registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/tke-view/view:php8.4 --push view/debian
